entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [7.0] microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain\WorkloadManifest.targets hardcodes net6.0 as TFM #60745
  • [release/3.1] Add area owners file to ensure that there is a packaging review on the servicing-approved prs #60743
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogRecord throws an InvalidOperationException on Windows 11 #60740
  • `CultureInfo` constructor fails with string "x-TEST" #60737
    7.0.0
  • system.drawing.tests.pentests.ctor_color_width failing in CI #60731
  • SocketsHttpHandler should proactively handle EOF from server on idle HTTP/1.1 connections #60729
  • ClickOnce - Value Does Not Fall Within the Expected Range #60715
  • [iOS/tvOS] Small set of test suites time out on devices #60713
    7.0.0
  • Runtime<->JIT reloc hinting mechanism needs work #60712
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.* (breaking?) change in NET6.0 #60710
  • [Required(AllowEmptyStrings = true)] data annotation causes client side validation error on empty strings #60716

Closed

  • [System.Text.Json] Add ability to serialize Comments on Properties #35251
    Future
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.AdditionalAttributesOnStub.SkipLocalsInitOnDownlevelTargetFrameworks(referenceAssemblies: ReferenceAssemblies { Assemblies = [], AssemblyIdentityComparer = AssemblyIdentityComparer { }, FacadeAssemblies = [], LanguageSpecificAssemblies = [], NuGetConfigFilePath = null, ... }, expectSkipLocalsInit: True) #60706
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Overflow throw exception #48350
    Future
  • JsonSerializerOptions.PropertyNamingPolicy not effect ExpandoObject #47707
    Future
  • Enable Utf8JsonReader to read json from stream #30328
    Future
  • serializeasync object to utf8jsonwriter with System.Text.Json #41943
    Future
  • Azure Function fails to load System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #54642
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json does not support TypeConverters #38812
    Future
  • MonoAOTCompiler: fast path "nothing changed" case #58975
    7.0.0
  • CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182
    6.0.0
  • Consider adding JsonDocument.TryParse() #387
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add File.ReadAllLinesAsync methods that return IAsyncEnumerable<string> #60719
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexCultureTests.TestIgnoreCaseRelation(options: Compiled) #60707
  • JsonElement implement standard interfaces #39384
    Future
  • Better handling of optional JSON properties in System.Text.Json #30450
    Future
  • Add support for path in JsonPropertyName to access nested property when deserializing json payload #38324
    Future
  • Improve multi-segment Utf8JsonReader test coverage for ReadOnlySequence #27949
    Future
  • Android x64: runtime tests failing - `Failed to install mobile app` #59679

PullRequests

Created

  • Rename USE_UPPER_ADDRESS -> USE_PREFERRED_RANGE, support it on Unix platforms #60747
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Remove exclusions to bad paths #60744
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Temp mono wasm branch for debugging 1388 #60742
    area-Serialization
  • Up retry for ETXTBSY #60741
  • [IGNORE][EXPERIMENT] [wasm][aot] link with O1 #60739
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix GCC warnings in test build #60734
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add console version of browser-bench sample #60733
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: some enhancements to redundant branch opts #60732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable additional llvmfullaot Linux_arm64 CI lane #60730
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Alter amount of tests that run per PR for mono mobile configurations #60727
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Properly use result value for dump IPC cmd #60726
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [metadata] Break up mono_metadata_parse_type_internal #60725
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Simplify runtime test projects #60724
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60723
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Turn off reloc generation for handles #60721
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Explicitly emit a diagnostic for ref returns in GeneratedDllImport stubs. #60720
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix typo in comment: NoPropogateInherit -> NoPropagateInherit #60717
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • SizeConst of MarshalAs(ByValTStr) loaded by MetadataLoadContext always returns zero #60714
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Remove xunit-performance dependency in tests #60711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Disable a couple of pen tests on Windows #60746
    area-System.Drawing
  • Add direct SDK installer links #53061
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • [llvmonly] Optimize delegate invocation. #60593
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix intermittent failure in DllImportGenerator unit tests when resolving assemblies #60722
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Reduce time for Regex tests #60660
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Add test for profiler inlining #60225
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Temporarily Allow Use of OpenSSL 1.0.2 In Perf Pipelines #60728
    tenet-performance, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use getexepath in mono to deduplicate related code #60449
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [DllImportGenerator] Stop adding unnecessary variable when marshalling UTF-16 string by value #60708
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Disable DllimportGenerator unit tests on ARM32 #60718
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, disabled-test
  • [release/6.0] Create a parent CMake project for building app bundles on CI #59154
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • Add copies of binarytrees-6 and fannkuch-redux-9 #60700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Several tweaks to RegexGenerator (the tool, not the emitted code) #60667
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [hackathon] `ValueArray` - a compliment type to the `Span`, which owns its data without indirections. #60519
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Rerun mobile target jobs when it fails for 4 known scenarios #60475
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid int[] allocation in ResourceReader when reading a decimal #60408
    area-System.Resources
  • Fix dependency of LLVM AOT jobs on CoreCLR product for CORE_ROOT #60681
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update docs for PipeReader.TryRead #52237
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution

Updated

  • [release/6.0] <EnablePreviewFeatures> for HttpStress #60682
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #59521
    area-System.Numerics, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #59389
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Updated tests regarding issue #48119 #52994
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • [hackathon] [testonly] ValueArray - a compliment type to the Span, which owns its data without indirections. #60608
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Validate CompressionLevel value is defined in BrotliStream ctor #57561
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve IndexOfAny(byte,byte,byte) #40894
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add limited support for backtracking Regex single char loops to simplified code gen #60385
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • fix https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/60282 #60283
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Add pull request template for 5.0 to point to the servicing docs #60414
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • always populate TargetHostName on SslStream #60589
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add HttpClient.PatchAsJsonAsync() apis #60672
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Run wasm aot, wbt tests on windows #59479
    area-Build-mono, Future
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60561
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • Don't special case "Experimental" projects #60641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] DotNetHost packages are not created during source-build #60577
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • Attempt to fix observed AV in mark_through_cards_for_segments #60617
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • [WIP] Enable runtime tests to run on Android arm32 #51642
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WIP] Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Prototype mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • API Implementation: Add Indexer to Vectors #60517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add test for blazor/sdk fix for lazy loaded assemblies #60673
    arch-wasm

entry.content:

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload removed from dotnet watch - Why? #22247
  • HPACK dynamic dictionary for request headers #22244
  • HPACK Huffman compression for request headers #22243
  • Request for Ubuntu 21.10 apt repo #22232
  • Erroneous NETSDK1045 when building a project with multiple TFMs where one is not recognized #22239

Closed

  • [question] Android's implementation of multiple $(RuntimeIdentifiers) #14359
    6.0.2xx
  • Some CLI commands don't respect DOTNET_CLI_UI_LANGUAGE #21159
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove reference to PlatformAbstractions #22254
    DO NOT MERGE
  • Fix nuget authenticated feed interaction #22251
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22242
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22233
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add Sha for roslyn 4.0.0 packages #22226
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22146
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update System.CommandLine version #21321
    Area-CLI
  • Revive skipped / scoped tests #21181
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Argument BC(--r/--a), add support for `--arch` #22180
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't report generator init failures as watsons #57315
    17.1
  • Disable most test jobs in PR builds #57313
  • Request for improvement of TextSpan.ToString() documentation. #57299
    17.1
  • IDE0058 should offer excluded_symbol_names configuration #57297
  • Localize user-facing warning annotation #57296
  • Analyzers not being recognized in Dev17 Preview 6 #57293
  • VS freezes when using Roslyn experimental instance containing multiple TFMs #57289

Closed

  • Warn about use of conditional null operator with an extension method that accepts null reference #57298
  • Variables scopes are incorrect #57311
  • Constant string field data is duplicated when accessed from the same assembly #57185
    17.1
  • Toplevel Statements and Source Code generation does not work together (CS0759) #57030
  • Assert.NotNull and .Should().NotBeNull() aren't treated as a null reference check (Incorrect warning: "CS8602: Dereference of a possibly null reference.") #57067
  • error CS0121: "The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties" after upgrade from net5.0 to 6.0.0-rc.1.21451.3 #57101
  • Upgrading VS build gives CS1668 in existing console windows #57143

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to calling into IAsyncLightBulbSession directly to avoid polling. #57316
    Area-IDE
  • Retry SetForegroundWindow with DTE.MainWindow #57314
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add diags to help us diagnose lightbulb issues better #57312
    Area-IDE
  • Add VSTypeScriptAsynchronousTaggerProvider #57310
    Area-IDE
  • Don't compute the information for the code definition window if not open #57307
    Area-IDE
  • Disable apphost build of 'csi', 'vbi' for source-build #57306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Integration tests for analyzers that use MS.CA.CSharp.Workspaces and MS.CA.VB.Workspaces #57305
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57303
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update TextSpan.cs #57300
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Add feature flag to enable LSP classifications in local scenarios #57291
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Have tagger wait on the OOP host having a complete compilation rather than waiting for the local host to have it. #57290
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57309
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Bump global.json pinned SDK version to NET 6 RC2 #57281
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57304
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add MS.CA.CSharp.Workspaces and MS.CA.VB.Workspaces as VSIX analyzer … #57294
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, Approved to merge, 17.0.P7
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57288
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix import reader #57117
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57285
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57284
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add ServiceHub core host integration test CI #57228
    Area-Infrastructure
  • handle null project paths in solution #57234
    Area-IDE
  • Move skeleton ref caching to ProjectStates #57158
    Area-IDE
  • If Length and Count are both present, only the former is assumed to be non-negative #57268
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Interpolated string handler IOperation support #56276
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add Features projects to SourceBuild #57277
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE
  • Options refactoring #57139
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • List patterns: main IDE scenarios and AddRequiredParens #53850
    Area-IDE, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • List patterns: IOperation #56008
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Portable to 1.7.0-beta-21315-03 #54131
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.1
  • Options5 #57254
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Pass completion options explicitly throughout the implementation of completion providers #57058
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Binder.CreateConversion - Report use-site diagnostics for the entire conversion hierarchy. #57175
    Area-Compilers
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Update extract method to support top-level statements #57084
    Area-IDE
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Build more projects during source-build #57165
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • IDECoreBenchmarks Changes #57112
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add generic versions of attributes in ASP.NET Core #37767
  • NavLink should have a core set of classes and inactive ones rather than just tacking on "Active" ones. #37765
  • Blazor Server exception when using SignalR with AAD authentication #37762
  • Test TlsHandshakeRejectsTlsLessThan12 fails on Server 2022 because TLS 1.1 is disabled #37761
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Optional Certificates - With Host names instead of IP's #37753
  • [Analyzer] Ensure Minimal API Endpoint Returns On All Paths #37751
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Flaky Test: Timeout for RequestTests.ConnectionClosedTokenFiresOnServerFIN(listenOptionsName: "Loopback") #37750
  • Blazor Wasm Standalone Hot Reload .NET 6 RC2 Visual Studio 2022 Preview 4 Kestrel #37749
  • Browserlink causes "TypeLoadException" for 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.IHttpSendFileFeature' after RC2 #37747
  • `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration` warnings in new project in ASP.NET Core 6.0 RC2 #37744
    .NET 7 Planning
  • TestServer HttpClient isn't able to handle redirect to external url #37742
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.BadHttpRequestException #37740
  • High Number of LoopBack Connection #37738

Closed

  • Generate TS Type Definition Files For `blazor.*.js` #5508
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Increased Build Times in net6.0 RC2 over RC1 (`rc.1.21416.1`) #36944
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor Components - Declaring parameters as obsolete does not show up in Intelisense #8075
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Obsolete attribute is ignored for Blazor component parameters #32206
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Is there any better solution for Blazor CSS isolation? #28443
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Access to CSS scope in RenderTreeBuilder (Blazor CSS isolation) #32614
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Test failure BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_IndividualAuth_Works_WithOutLocalDB on Win10 ARM #34554
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Add a way to configure the IHttpRequestIdentifierFeature to read a configurable header #5914
    Next sprint planning
  • `<InputCheckboxGroup>` component and `<InputCheckbox>` support for other values than `bool` #37730
  • Cannot perform a HEAD request with browser request mode NoCors #30599
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Determine device support list for wasm AOT #33080
    6.0-docs-infra
  • calling OnPostPrint, sometimes I got dates from model binding property, sometimes i got default dates (0001-01-01 , 00:00).1st, 3rd calls i got default dates, 2nd, 4th calls i got real dates #37539
  • Expose `ElementReference` through `EventArgs` or through `on<event>` delegate #37733
  • Support of built-in Input components to work outside `EditForm` #37729
  • Packaging a client-side Blazor project into a single JS file #37732
  • Blazor Initial Load #37737
  • Unable to load shared library 'urlmon.dll' on linux environment #37436
  • reakpoints in partial class #37741
  • Route Constraints #37727
  • Single file build time improvement: proxy-yarp #36982
  • SignalR Question: Multiple hubs working with single connection #37702
  • SignalR typescript client fails to add custom headers #37700

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to stable Roslyn versions (#37663) #37764
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fix AppHost pack prebuilt usage in source-build #37760
  • Unquarantine (most) HTTP3 tests #37756
    area-runtime
  • Make tests for FileLoggerProcessor system time independent #37755
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable retry for bind tests #37754
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Server2022 to helix matrix & quarantine jobs #37745
    area-infrastructure
  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies #37739
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Clean up remaining `net461` references #37731
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Update selenium driver versions #37766
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • Fix Quarantined Tests Scheduled Runtime #37763
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix Selenium Versions #37746
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine ConnectionClosedTokenFiresOnServerFIN #37752
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix AppHost pack prebuilt usage in source-build #37672
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix test typos #37701
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Upgrade Selenium Versions #37726
    7.0-preview1
  • Remove retries from BlazorWasm template tests & don't fail on restore errors #37715
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Support setting ApiParameterRouetInfo for endpoints #37470
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Refresh BuildFromSource docs #37362
    area-infrastructure
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • [Helix] Switch to win11 for pr checks #37712
    area-infrastructure
  • Continue using HashCodeCombiner in Razor.Language #37725
    area-mvc
  • Unquarantine `AuthorizeViewCases_RequirePolicy_Authorized` #37717
    area-blazor
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md #37696
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] CollectionView with grids and stacklaouts on itemtemplate #3062
  • [Bug] iframe with querystring to local file inside MAUI Blazor App #3061
  • [Bug] .NET MAUI Blazor App crashed on physical device #3060
  • [Bug] Border accepts multiple children #3059
  • [Bug] Navigation Page as Wrapper does not work #3058

Closed

  • [Bug] Fix Android NavigationManager to not use a static dictionary for communicating to children #2805
  • [Bug] FlexLayout doesn't space children with BindableLayout #1874
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] FlexLayout.Grow change doesn't trigger layout update #2054
  • [Bug] FlexLayout grow and shrink and basis aren't working #1502
  • [Bug] Star Grid lengths using decimal values don't appear to work #3053
  • [Bug] Vs2022 preview4 Maui windows uwp binding twoway does not work #2580

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Shell Fragment Container #3068
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] CollectionView handler for android #3067
    do-not-merge
  • Use app div instead of app tag for Blazor templates #3066
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄
  • Enable GitHub action to apply labels based on who opened the issue/PR #3055
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Fix VS Stable cake target #3065
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Don't force GridLayout * weights to integer values; #3064
    area/layout 🔲
  • Signal native text changes to Entry on Windows #3054
  • Clean up the Application extensions #3042
  • [Handler]Collectionview handler for iOS #2156

Updated

  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
  • Add Collectionview sample galleries #3047
    area/controls 🎮
  • Ensure ScrollView performs cross-platform measure #3050
    area/layout 🔲
  • Add `ITextButton` and related Mappers #2868
    area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Non-nullable value comparer can't be applied on nullable type #26429
  • Exception in SQL server query in EF Core 6, looks related to HasQueryFilter(), worked in EF Core 5 #26428
  • EF Core DBContext scaffolding with custom model naming convention #26426
  • Async methods blocking? #26425
  • Repeatable read issue with EF Core #26424
  • Table splitting and generated columns (specifically full text search) #26423
  • RC2 Sqlite provider no longer clears temporary files on exit #26422
  • Suggestions to making QueryIterationFailed a bit more useful #26421
  • ILogger event SaveChangesFailed includes unserializable state #26417

Closed

  • Many to Many Migration with [Table] Annotation produces RenameTable #26409
  • Hidden Columns Removed in EF Core 6 RC 2 Scaffold #26329
  • Getting NullReferenceException when calling ExecuteSqlRaw(...) api using IBM EF Core provider #26389
  • Blazor requires linker hints to preserve APIs accessed via reflection #21099
  • EFCORE 3.1 - Logger property missing in QuerySqlGeneratorDependencies" #20873
  • Query/Test: convert the "no_data" tests in NorthwindAggregateOperatorsQueryTestBase to use AssertQuery #26397
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Copy client projections when updating SelectExpression #26431
  • [6.0.1] Allow non-nullable value comparer to be applied on nullable properties #26430
    Servicing-consider
  • Fix to #26344 - SqlNullabilityProcessor and COALESCE with more than two arguments #26419

Merged

  • Fix to #26397 - Query/Test: convert the "no_data" tests in NorthwindAggregateOperatorsQueryTestBase to use AssertQuery #26420
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Update to .NET SDK 6.0 RC2 #26394
  • Cache Eventargs in SQLiteConnection #26291
    community-contribution
  • Cache ParamCount together with a statement for SQLite #26380

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove F# test workaround #12479

PullRequests

Created

  • We previously didn't run tests on arm64 #12486
  • Remove RC2 and 3.1.1xx from the table. #12485
  • Prepare source-build for prebuiltless build #12483

Merged

  • Workaround missing smoke-test prereqs #12481
  • [ArPow] Re-enable building Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Features* in roslyn source-build #12465
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Remove compiler project apphosts in source-build to remove apphost pack prebuilt #12456
  • Revert "Revert "[release/6.0.1xx] Switch to stable RTM branding"" #12471
  • [ArPow] Build msbuild for net472 and remove dependency on VS component #12472
  • Update source-build prebuilts and previous source-build #12477
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Repoint source-build dependencies for runtime and aspnet #12478
  • Fix patch removing aspnetcore apphost pack prebuilt #12469
  • Update source-build prebuilts and previous source-built #12466
  • [ArPow] Add roslyn-analyzers as format dependency #12468

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #12371
  • Enable missing TFMs for NuGet and MSBuild to remove templating prebuilts #12467
  • Remove install location from Windows conclusion #12401
